original: 汝南固始人，東吳官員。少時曾陪孫權伴讀，以文采聞名，孫權的各種誥命、文、表等等，大多都是出自胡綜之手。胡綜尤擅作辭賦，有《黃龍大牙賦》傳世。
text: Runan Gushi, official of Soochow. When he was young, he accompanied Sun Quan to read, and he was famous for his literary talents. Most of Sun Quan's deeds, essays, tables, etc. were written by Hu Zong. Hu Zongyou is good at writing poetry and has 'Huanglong Daya Fu' handed down.
